memberdef.name: lv_mem_assert
memberdef.initializer: { \ if(p == NULL) { \ LV_LOG_ERROR("Out of memory!"); \ while(1) \ ; \ } \ }

detaileddescription.para: Halt on NULL pointer p pointer to a memory
Initiaize the dyn_mem module (work memory and other variables)

Allocate a memory dynamically
size
size of the memory to allocate in bytes
pointer to the allocated memory

Free an allocated data
data
pointer to an allocated memory

Reallocate a memory with a new size. The old content will be kept.
data
pointer to an allocated memory. Its content will be copied to the new memory block and freed
new_size
the desired new size in byte
pointer to the new memory
Join the adjacent free memory blocks

Give information about the work memory of dynamic allocation
mon_p
pointer to a dm_mon_p variable, the result of the analysis will be stored here

Give the size of an allocated memory
data
pointer to an allocated memory
the size of data memory in bytes
